details: Worked in SDG Lab to develop an App & Web Interface for monitoring and control of MEOSAR.

Developed a complete website from scratch which displays deals & coupons from different e-commerce sites.

A Web Application where professors/staffs can monitor their PDF records.

Implemented Infix to Prefix Algorithm and Stack data structure in Java to make an Android App.
A Real Time Chatting App with awesome look, super fast text and multimedia messaging feature and secured with AES encryption algorithm.
